options.label: fig-production-trends
options.fig.cap: Coffee production trends (FAOSTAT). Brazil dominates total supply among the selected origins.

options.label: fig-employment-agri
options.fig.cap: Employment in agriculture (%). Higher values suggest higher dependence on rural/agricultural livelihoods.

options.label: fig-rural-growth
options.fig.cap: Rural population growth (%). A proxy for demographic pressure and rural transformation.

options.label: fig-esg-score
options.fig.cap: ESG proxy score (illustrative). A transparent scoring method to support strategic discussions.
